Class FileMergeSort

java.lang.Object
com.file.service.FileMergeSort
public class FileMergeSort extends Object
Program to Sort and Merge files of a directory in a way that is efficient and scalable

  • Constructor Details

    • FileMergeSort

      public FileMergeSort()

  • Method Details

    • mergeAndSortFiles

      public void mergeAndSortFiles(String inputDirectoryPath, String outputFileDirectory, String tempDirectoryPath, boolean removeDiplicates) throws Exception
      If the number of files in the Input Directory is greater that Maximum_Temp_File_Count, Then merge files into a single file and then split this file in to atmost 1024 temparory files. Easier to perform a K-way sort If Number of files in input Directory is less than Maximum_Temp_File_Count then directly perform K-way sort on the files and merge them.
      Parameters:
      inputDirectoryPath - - Input Directory path
      outputFileDirectory - - Output Directory path
      tempDirectoryPath - - Directory Path to where the temporary file will be stored.
      removeDiplicates - - Flag to remove duplicates
      Throws:
      Exception

    • temproryMergeFiles

      public String temproryMergeFiles(List<Path> inputFilePaths, String tempDirectoryPath) throws Exception
      If Number of Files in the input directory is greater than Maximum_Temp_File_Count. Merge files into 1 file.
      Parameters:
      inputFilePaths - - Paths of files inside the input directory.
      tempDirectoryPath - - Directory Path to where the temporary merged file will be stored.
      Returns:
      Temporary_merged_file path.
      Throws:
      Exception - - if input directory is empty throws Exception ("No input Files Found")

    • splitAndSort

      public void splitAndSort(String tempMergedUnsortedFile, String tempSplitDirectoryPath) throws Exception
      Split the Temporary_merged_file into smaller files. Maximum number of temporary files should be less than Maximum_Temp_File_Count. Estimate the size of file after split. Add string from the Temporary_merged_file to a list until the size of the list = estimated file size Sort the list and create a temporary file containing this block of sorted words and save it to the Temporary directory
      Parameters:
      tempMergedUnsortedFile - - Temporary merged File Path
      tempSplitDirectoryPath - - Temporary Directory path to where temporary files after split must be saved.
      Throws:
      Exception - - if size of temporary_merged_files is 0, then throw exception as Input Directory contained files with no content in it.

    • mergeSortedFiles

      public void mergeSortedFiles(String tempSplitDirectoryPath, String outputFileDirectory, boolean removeDiplicates) throws IOException
      Sort and Merge the temporary files using K-Way merge sort. Stream for each file is created and added into a Priority Queue The priority queue is Custom Sorted based on the latest line read from each of the file. The first element in the queue will be the smallest and hence added to the list. Once the List has 500 elements, it is written to the Output file This is repeated until End of File in each file
      Parameters:
      tempSplitDirectoryPath - - Temporary Directory path to where temporary files after split is saved.
      outputFileDirectory - - Directory where the Output file is to be created
      removeDiplicates -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • listFilesFromDirectory

      public List<Path> listFilesFromDirectory(String inputDirectoryPath) throws Exception
      Get the List input file paths inside the input Directory.
      Parameters:
      inputDirectoryPath - - Input Directory path.
      Returns:
      ArrayList - List of paths of files in the input directory.
      Throws:
      Exception - - Exception is thrown if the Input Directory path is invalid.
